 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּצַע‎</span>] **verb** ==cut off, break off, gain by violence== (so Late Hebrew, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhIgAdAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAiAB0AAAJUhI+py+0PU5gz2hNMvrHmzTkUFXZQVT5j2owoq7zwbNIMaS+glOtyr9mVXMLf70aUFIW+jZHJxHhARBwiGqxqdaIkNia6PJFiqPkbO1dza6D7rSgAADs=">, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּצַע‎</span>) — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִבְצָ֑ע‎</span> [[Job.27.8|Job 27:8]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִבְצָ֑עוּ‎</span> [[Joel.2.8|Joel 2:8]] ***Imperative*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּצָ֫עַם בְּרֹאשׁ‎</span> [[Amos.9.1|Amos 9:1]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּצֹעַ‎</span> [[Ezek.22.27|Ezek 22:27]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּוֺצֵעַ‎</span> [[Prov.15.27|Prov 15:27]]; [[Jer.6.13|Jer 6:13]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֹּצֵעַ‎</span> [[Ps.10.3|Ps 10:3]] + 3 t.; — ***cut off, break off*** (with accusative capitals of pillars) [[Amos.9.1|Amos 9:1]] (but [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Prov.</sup> see vi <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּצַעַם‎</span> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּזַעַם‎</span> [[Hab.3.12|Hab 3:12]] ***in wrath***); so figurative [[Job.27.8|Job 27:8]] ***when Eloah cutteth off, draweth out, his soul***; object omitted ***their course***, i.e. stop [[Joel.2.8|Joel 2:8]] (compare [[BDB#Hi|Hi]]-[[BDB#St|St]]); usually ***gain by violence*** or in general ***wrongfully*** [[Ezek.22.27|Ezek 22:27]] ***Participle*** absolute [[Ps.10.3|Ps 10:3]] = ***greedy getter, robber***; and with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֶּ֫צַע‎</span> [[Prov.1.19|Prov 1:19]]; [[Prov.15.27|Prov 15:27]]; [[Jer.6.13|Jer 6:13]]; [[Jer.8.10|Jer 8:10]]; [[Hab.2.9|Hab 2:9]]. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּצַּע‎</span> [[Lam.2.17|Lam 2:17]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְבַצַּע‎</span> [[Isa.10.12|Isa 10:12]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְבַצְּעֵנִי‎</span> [[Isa.38.12|Isa 38:12]]; [[Job.6.9|Job 6:9]] 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתְּבַצְּעִי‎</span> [[Ezek.22.12|Ezek 22:12]] 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּבַצָּ֑עְנָה‎</span> [[Zech.4.9|Zech 4:9]] — ***cut off***, (***dis***) ***sever*** (i.e. from life) [[Job.6.9|Job 6:9]] compare [[Isa.10.19|Isa 10:19]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִדַּלָּה‎</span>); = ***finish, complete*** [[Isa.10.12|Isa 10:12]]; [[Zech.4.9|Zech 4:9]] ***accomplish*** (= carry out, fulfil) [[Lam.2.17|Lam 2:17]] (object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אמרתו‎</span>); ***violently make gain of***, object person [[Ezek.22.12|Ezek 22:12]] (instrumental <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּעשׁק‎</span>).
